root.TaylorSwift: <1> Approximately, how many months are generally between Taylor Swift albums? 22 24 23 25 24 </1> <2> What movie, originally a Disney show, did Taylor Swift make a cameo and Perform? Hannah Montana Wizards of Waverly Place Good Luck Charlie The Suite Life Hannah Montana </2> <3> What network had Taylor Swift’s Journey to Fearless special first appear on? Teennick Cartoon Network Discovery Kids The Hub The Hub </3> <4> What year did Taylor Swift’s Christmas Album come out in? 2008 2006 2007 2009 2007 </4> <5> Who did Taylor Swift do a CMT Crossroads special with? Def Leppard Lynyrd Skynard The Rolling Stones Whitesnake Def Leppard </5> <6> Which Taylor Swift album won a Grammy for an album of the year? Taylor Swift Fearless Speak Now Red Fearless </6> <7> What year did Taylor Swift win a People’s Choice Award for female artist? 2010 2012 2011 2009 2010 </7> <8> What consecutive years did Taylor Swift win a People’s Choice award for country artist? 2012-2013 2009-2010 2011-2012 2008-2009 2011-2012 </8> <9> Which song, from the Red album, got the highest RIAA certification? Everything Has Changed I Knew You Were Trouble 22 Red I Knew You Were Trouble </9> <10> Which Taylor Swift song, from the Fearless album, did the best on the charts? Fifteen White Horse You Belong With Me Love Story Love Story </10>
root.CarrieUnderwood: <1> Who Did Carrie Underwood beat to win season 4 of American Idol? Oh Love Always on My Mind Can’t Stop Lovin’ You Remind Me Remind Me </3> <4> What record did SoundScan give to Carrie Underwood’s album Some Hearts? Quickest rise to #1 on the country charts for a debut fastest-selling debut country album Most number ! hits for a country debut album Longest time at number 1 for an American Idol Contestant fastest-selling debut country album </4> <5> Which album has not gone at least 2x Platinum? Play On Some Hearts Blown Away Carnival Ride Blown Away </5> <6> Which Soundtrack did Carrie Underwood contribute to? Enchanted Chronicle of Narnia: The Lion, the Witch & the Wardrobe Soul Surfer Sex and the City 2 Enchanted </6> <7> Which Super Bowl did Carrie Underwood perform the National Anthem for? XLIV XLV XLIII XLVI XLIV </7> <8> Which Award show has Carrie Underwood won the Triple Crown Award? Academy of Country Music Awards CMA Awards American Country Music Awards CMT Music Awards Academy of Country Music Awards </8> <9> Which non-Country Award show has Carrie Underwood won the Triple Crown Award? People’s Choice Awards Teen Choice Awards American Music Awards Grammy’s American Music Awards </9> <10> What female first did Billboard bestow on Carrie Underwood? 10 Consecutive number 1 songs in less than 5 years Most consecutive number 1 songs since the debut song Back to Back to Back for top album Back to Back for top Country album Back to Back for top Country album </10>
root.TheBeatles: <1> What is the name of the Beatles before they became the Beatles? The British Rebels Lennon The McCartney Band Quarrymen Quarrymen </1> <2> What airport did the Beatles arrive in America at? Philadelphia International JFK International Baltimore Washington Laguardia JFK International </2> <3> Who was a member of the Beatles during the year of BeatleMania? Billy Preston Jimmie Nicol Gerry Marsden Les Maguire Jimmie Nicol </3> <4> What war was Beatles music used for in a war documentary? Korean War Vietnam War Iraqi War WWII WWII </4> <5> Which former Beatle band mate is the only one to have an album go 6x Platinum by the RIAA? George Harrison John Lennon Paul McCartney Ringo Starr George Harrison </5> <6> What Beatles extended play album went #1 in the UK & Australia? Long Tall Sally Magical Mystery Tour All My Loving Requests All My Loving </6> <7> According to the RIAA, at least how many certified million units of Beatles albums have been sold? 150 175 178 200 178 </7> <8> How many millions of records have the Beatles of sold worldwide? 600 575 550 650 600 </8> <9> What musician purchased the publishing rights to the beatle anthology in the mid 1990’s? Paul McCartney Michael Jackson Mick Jagger Bono Michael Jackson </9> <10> What boy group covered 6 Beatles songs for a movie? Big Time Rush One Direction Backstreet Boys O-Town Big Time Rush </10>
root.MariahCarey: <1> In the 1990’s, how many albums did Mariah Carey release? 5 8 6 7 7 </1> <2> Which Mariah Carey album was not released in the three year span of the mid to late 2000’s decade? Memoirs of an Imperfect Angel E=MC2 Merry Christmas II You The Emancipation of Mimi The Emancipation of Mimi </2> <3> Which Mariah Carey album had a music video that featured actor Jerry O’Connell? Butterfly Glitter Rainbow Charmbracelet Rainbow </3> <4> Which Mariah Carey album is the best-selling album in Japan by a non-Asian Artist? Rainbow #1’s Butterfly Charmbracelet #1’s </4> <5> Which single from the Emancipation of Mimi soundtrack went platinum? We Belong Together Shake It Off Don’t Forget about Us It’s Like That We Belong Together </5> <6> Which single from the Glitter soundtrack was the only one to get certified by the RIAA? Never Too Far Don’t Stop Reflections Loverboy Loverboy </6> <7> Which song from the #1’s album went gold by RIAA certification? When you Believe Dance With My Father Sweetheart Whenever You Call When you Believe </7> <8> Which movie earned Mariah Carey the most Golden Raspberry nominations? State Property 2 Glitter Tennessee WiseGirls Glitter </8> <9> Which film, that Mariah Carey appeared in, came out in the 1990’s?
